V0.1.0.description:
initial release

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

CLIENT:
- Have Hunie Cam Studio Installed
- Download Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version)
- Extract and copy the contents of "Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago Client v#.#.#.zip" to the directory where "HunieCamStudio.exe" is

APWORLD (needed for generating archieplago game):
- Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest )
- Download Spirit Valley APWorld (See Releases for latest version)
- Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Hunie Cam Studio APWorld you downloaded
- Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install
- (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default Hunie Cam Studio YMAL
V0.1.0.title: Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin v0.1.0

V0.2.0.description:
V0.2.0
- Replaced Archipelago.MultiClient.Net with DotsWebsocket/CursedArchipelagoClient due to mono incompatibility
- added codes:
- - "$day22": allows goal to send locations before client has reached day 22 so long as force goal isn't enabled in YMAL
- - "$oldgame": allows the option to continue a saved game if client had restarted



INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

CLIENT:
- Have Hunie Cam Studio Installed
- Download Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version)
- Extract and copy the contents of "Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago Client v#.#.#.zip" to the directory where "HunieCamStudio.exe" is

APWORLD (needed for generating archieplago game):
- Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest )
- Download Spirit Valley APWorld (See Releases for latest version)
- Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Hunie Cam Studio APWorld you downloaded
- Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install
- (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default Hunie Cam Studio YMAL
V0.2.0.title: Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin v0.2.0

V0.2.1.description:
- fixed problems in APWorld when start_slots is set to 1
- fixed typos in APWorld that meant item_slots option not being used properly
- fixed not actually modifying girl data in the client after connecting to a server
- fixed shop not working when there are AP items in it

V0.2.0 Changelog
- Replaced Archipelago.MultiClient.Net with DotsWebsocket/CursedArchipelagoClient due to mono incompatibility
- added codes:
- - "$day22": allows goal to send locations before client has reached day 22 so long as force goal isn't enabled in YMAL
- - "$oldgame": allows the option to continue a saved game if client had restarted



INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

CLIENT:
- Have Hunie Cam Studio Installed
- Download Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version)
- Extract and copy the contents of "Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago Client v#.#.#.zip" to the directory where "HunieCamStudio.exe" is

APWORLD (needed for generating archieplago game):
- Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest )
- Download Spirit Valley APWorld (See Releases for latest version)
- Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Hunie Cam Studio APWorld you downloaded
- Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install
- (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default Hunie Cam Studio YMAL
V0.2.1.title: Hunie Cam Studio Archipelago plugin v0.2.1

V0.3.0.description:
- fixed client not sending completion to server
- fixed "$goal" working before reaching day 22 and not working afterwards

V0.3.1.description:
- (Client) Added a check to see if your connecting from the same server as the last connection to allow for continuing a save (NOTE will only work on saves started after updating)

V0.3.0 changelog
- fixed client not sending completion to server
- fixed "$goal" working before reaching day 22 and not working afterwards
